nodes.text: The Sweet Time was a modified Kuat Drive Yards space yacht used by a Jedi Coalition strike team—composed of Jedi Ben Skywalker, Leia Organa Solo, Han Solo and Jaina Solo—as their base of operations during a mission to Coruscant. After Skywalker was captured by Sith apprentice Tahiri Veila and the Galactic Alliance Guard, the rest of the strike team flew the Sweet Time into a Jedi Coalition rendezvous point to report Ben's capture to his father, Luke Skywalker.
